message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $90 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $110. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $100. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $82.50?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $82.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $82.50 and $100, so I'm counteroffering at $91.50. This is my last concession, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
